details.name: Hisn al-Muslim
details.chapter: Upon experiencing unrest, fear, apprehensiveness during sleep

data.reference: Abu Dawud 4/12. See also Al-Albani, Sahih At- Tirmidhi 3/171
data.arabic: أَعـوذُ بِكَلِمـاتِ اللّهِ التّـامّـاتِ مِن غَضَـبِهِ وَعِـقابِهِ وَشَـرِّ عِبـادِهِ وَمِنْ هَمَـزاتِ الشَّـياطينِ وَأَنْ يَحْضـرون
data.meaning: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from His anger and His punishment, from the evil of His slaves, and from the taunts of devils and from their presence.
data.transliteration:
A`ūdhu bikalimāti ‘llāhit-tāmmāti
min ghaḍabihi wa `iqābihi wa sharri `ibādih,
wa min hamazātish-shayāṭīni wa an yaḥḍurūn.
